snippet: The terrorist group ISIS said it executed James Foley in retaliation for American airstrikes in Iraq.
abstract: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria posts video that it says shows the beheading of James Foley, American journalist who was kidnapped in Syria nearly two years ago; authenticity of video is not immediately be verified; ISIS claims execution is in retaliation for American airstrikes ordered by Pres Obama against the extremist group in Iraq.

byline.contributor: Julie Davis contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: The terrorist group ISIS said it executed James Foley in retaliation for American airstrikes in Iraq.

headline.seo: ISIS Video Purports to Show Beheading of James Foley
headline.main: Militant Group Says It Killed American Journalist in Syria
headline.print_headline: ISIS Says It Beheaded American Journalist in Syria
